resources.string: To show floating elements on Android 6.0+, grant the \"Draw Over Other Apps\" permission
To detect the foreground app and display the speed limit, the accessibility service must be enabled.
To automatically display the speed limit in map apps, turn on the accessibility service
To display the overlay, enable the \"Draw Over Other Apps\" permission
To determine the speed limit at your location, please grant the location permission
Unable to open settings. Please manually enable the \"Draw Over Other Apps\" setting for Velociraptor.
Unable to open settings. Please manually enable the Accessibility Service setting for Velociraptor.
Velociraptor doesn\'t have adequate permissions. Please open the app to grant them.
GPS is not turned on. Please enable for Velociraptor\'s speed limit monitor.
Network is not connected. Velociraptor requires Internet connectivity to fetch the speed limit.

Velociraptor is a floating speed limit monitor with speedometer and warning features, using OpenStreetMap and HERE Maps speed limit data.

Developed by Daniel Ciao
Website   Email   Twitter   Google+   GitHub   LinkedIn

GitHub - source, issues, feature requests
OneSky - translate the app to your language
Go to OpenStreetMap on your computer to edit the data. Touch to share link (https://openstreetmap.org)
